fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.hem2020e3.equipments.boiler.sil

Class BoilerElectricalSILModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.Model
      • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.AtomicModel
        • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.AtomicHIOA

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.interfaces.EventsExchangingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.interfaces.ModelDescriptionI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.interfaces.VariablesSharingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.AtomicModelI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.ModelI, java.io.Serializable

    public class BoilerElectricalSILModel
extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.AtomicHIOA
    The class BoilerElectricalSILModel defines a SIL simulation model for the electricity consumption of a boiler.

    Description

    The mode; is rather simple. When the boiler is heating, it consumes its nominal energy given by its power in watts divided by the tension in volts. When it is not heating, it consumes nothing.

    The model imports events notifying the state changes of the boiler.

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2021-01-04

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
